dict.acceptation: 液体的；清澈的；（声音）流畅的；易转换成现款的；

sent.orig: Use: hand washing liquid, liquid, shampoo, bath liquid and so on.
sent.trans: 用途：洗手液，消毒液，洗发水，沐浴露等。

sent.orig: Outside acting on liquid, uses the force that liquid area reduces, is called liquid surface tension.
sent.trans: 作用于液体表面，使液体表面积缩小的力，称为液体表面张力。

sent.orig: Applications for membrane contactors are in gas–liquid and liquid–liquid contacting operations.
sent.trans: 应用膜接触是在气液和液液联系业务。

sent.orig: Mainly applicated in ocean oil wells as complete liquid stationary liquid and amend liquid.
sent.trans: 潍坊裕凯化工有限公司主要用作海洋石油钻井完井液。固井液。修井液。

sent.orig: Neutralization happens when an acid liquid is mixed with an alkaline liquid.
sent.trans: 将酸性液体和碱性液体掺混起来会发生中和反应。
